creator: Phil Mackintosh
title: The Short Story on Index Inclusion
dc:creator: Phil Mackintosh
content: Uncover the interesting dynamics in today’s markets between short interest and index inclusion. At first, these two seem unrelated, but when you look at the data, some patterns emerge.
contentSnippet: Uncover the interesting dynamics in today’s markets between short interest and index inclusion. At first, these two seem unrelated, but when you look at the data, some patterns emerge.

creator: Phil Mackintosh
title: New Round Lot Rules Help Issuers with High-Priced Stocks
dc:creator: Phil Mackintosh
content: The new SEC round lot regime improves the round lot constraint problem. Starting in November, on-screen spreads for the highest priced stocks, should be better (lower).
contentSnippet: The new SEC round lot regime improves the round lot constraint problem. Starting in November, on-screen spreads for the highest priced stocks, should be better (lower).
